network_overview: The trace shows two independent 4G control-plane transactions: a GTP-C v2 Create-Bearer-Request/Response pair that fails with cause 209, and two Diameter CCR exchanges on TCP/3868, one succeeding (Result-Code 2001) and one failing (Result-Code 4010). No user-plane or voice traffic is captured.

observations.finding: GTP-C Create-Bearer-Request (msg 0x10) sent at 16.984 s receives Create-Bearer-Response with cause 209 (unknown) at 17.049 s; bearer establishment fails.
Diameter CCR for session mscp02.cmg01... receives successful answer (Result-Code 2001) within 40 ms.
Separate Diameter CCR for session cmg01... receives failure answer (Result-Code 4010) within 10 ms.

root_causes.description: S-GW returns Create-Bearer-Response with cause 209 (vendor-specific/unknown) rejecting the bearer creation attempt.
root_causes.impact: Prevents establishment of the corresponding GTP-U tunnel; subscriber data session cannot start.

root_causes.description: One of two CCR transactions fails with Result-Code 4010, indicating an authentication/authorization or policy rejection.
root_causes.impact: May block service activation or policy enforcement for the associated subscriber.

inconclusive_aspects.reason: No SIP, RTP, or IMS protocols observed
inconclusive_aspects.additional_capture_needed: Capture on P-CSCF or SBC interfaces including SIP and RTP

inconclusive_aspects.reason: Vendor-specific cause not decoded; no further GTPv2 diagnostics AVPs seen
inconclusive_aspects.additional_capture_needed: GTPv2-C capture with full Information Element details from S-GW logs

inconclusive_aspects.reason: GTP-U tunnel never established; no RTP observed
inconclusive_aspects.additional_capture_needed: Parallel user-plane capture on S1-U/S5 interfaces

recommendations.action: Investigate S-GW logs for vendor-specific cause 209 to clarify bearer rejection reason.
recommendations.rationale: Bearer creation failure blocks data path; exact reason needed to fix policy or configuration.

recommendations.action: Check PCRF/OCS for Diameter Result-Code 4010 trigger (e.g., credit limit, roaming restriction).
recommendations.rationale: 4010 indicates service denial; aligning policy rules can prevent subscriber impact.

session_analysis.signaling_health: Mixed: one Diameter transaction succeeds, one fails with 4010; GTP-C bearer setup fails with cause 209.
session_analysis.user_plane_health: Not established: GTP-U tunnel creation never confirmed; no user-plane packets observed.
session_analysis.voice_quality: Not observable at this capture point.
session_analysis.cross_plane_correlation: No correlation possible: user-plane absent and no SIP/RTP present.

sequence_diagram:
sequenceDiagram
    participant MME
    participant SGW
    participant PCRF1
    participant PCRF2
    MME->>SGW: GTPv2-C Create-Bearer-Request (0x10)
    SGW->>MME: GTPv2-C Create-Bearer-Response (0x11, cause 209)
    PCRF1->>PCRF1: Diameter CCR (session mscp02...)
    PCRF1->>PCRF1: CCA (Result-Code 2001)
    PCRF2->>PCRF2: Diameter CCR (session cmg01...)
    PCRF2->>PCRF2: CCA (Result-Code 4010)
